government\"},\"section\":\"\",\"image\":\"\",\"answer\":\"a\",\"solution\":\"\",\"examtype\":\"wassce\",\"examyear\":\"1999\"},{\"id\":390,\"question\":\"Which constitution was created to legislate practiced in Nigeria’s Third Republic was\",\"option\":{\"a\":\"multi-party\",\"b\":\"two-party\",\"c\":\"zero-party\",\"d\":\"one-party.\",\"e\":\"one-party.\"},\"section\":\"\",\"image\":\"\",\"answer\":\"b\",\"solution\":\"\",\"examtype\":\"utme\",\"examyear\":\"2013\"},{\"id\":382,\"question\":\"Islam century\",\"e\":\"by the British in the early 20th century\"},\"section\":\"\",\"image\":\"\",\"answer\":\"c\",\"solution\":\"\",\"examtype\":\"utme\",\"examyear\":\"2016\"},{\"id\":77,\"question\":\"A social system in which power is derived from \"},\"section\":\"\",\"image\":\"\",\"answer\":\"b\",\"solution\":\"\",\"examtype\":\"post-utme\",\"examyear\":\"2009\"},{\"id\":309,\"question\":\"In a federal system of government, the center the other components\"},\"section\":\"\",\"image\":\"\",\"answer\":\"a\",\"solution\":\"\",\"examtype\":\"wassce\",\"examyear\":\"1999\"},{\"id\":629,\"question\":\"In the Oyo traditional political system, the Alaafin of Oyo was elected or chosen by a group known as the\",\"option\":{\"a\":\"Bales\",\"b\":\"Obas\",\"c\":\"Ogboni\",\"d\":\"Oyomesi.\",\"e\":\"Oyomesi.\"},\"section\":\"\",\"image\":\"\",\"answer\":\"d\",\"solution\":\"\",\"examtype\":\"wassce\",\"examyear\":\"1988\"},{\"id\":24,\"question\":\"Which of these countries has the highest population in West Africa? \",\"option\":{\"a\":\"Mauritania\",\"b\":\"Ghana \",\"c\":\"The Gambia \",\"d\":\"Nigeria.\",\"e\":\"Nigeria.\"},\"section\":\"\",\"image\":\"\",\"answer\":\"d\",\"solution\":\"\",\"examtype\":\"post-utme\",\"examyear\":\"2007\"},{\"id\":243,\"question\":\"Which of the following groups had the best egalitarian traditional political system?\",\"option\":{\"a\":\"Hausa/Fulani\",\"b\":\"Yoruba\",\"c\":\"lgbo\",\"d\":\"Edo\",\"e\":\"Edo\"},\"section\":\"\",\"image\":\"\",\"answer\":\"c\",\"solution\":\"\",\"examtype\":\"wassce\",\"examyear\":\"2000\"},{\"id\":80,\"question\":\"Which of these constitutions recognized local government is the third tier of government? \",\"option\":{\"a\":\"The 1946 constitution \",\"b\":\"The 1960 constitution\",\"c\":\"The 1963 constitution \",\"d\":\"the 1979 constitution.\",\"e\":\"the 1979 constitution.\"},\"section\":\"\",\"image\":\"\",\"answer\":\"d\",\"solution\":\"\",\"examtype\":\"post-utme\",\"examyear\":\"2009\"},{\"id\":699,\"question\":\"One of the first action of military governments when they take over power in Nigeria is to\",\"option\":{\"a\":\"detain all the politicians\",\"b\":\"appoint new ministers and commissioners\",\"c\":\"tour the country to explain why they have taken over\",\"d\":\"suspend the constitution\",\"e\":\"suspend the constitution\"},\"section\":\"\",\"image\":\"\",\"answer\":\"d\",\"solution\":\"\",\"examtype\":\"wassce\",\"examyear\":\"1989\"},{\"id\":233,\"question\":\"Nigeria’s first constitution was the\",\"option\":{\"a\":\"Lyttleton Constitution\",\"b\":\"Clifford Constitution\",\"c\":\"Macpherson constitution\",\"d\":\"Independence Constitution\",\"e\":\"Independence Constitution\"},\"section\":\"\",\"image\":\"\",\"answer\":\"b\",\"solution\":\"\",\"examtype\":\"wassce\",\"examyear\":\"2000\"},{\"id\":240,\"question\":\"In the federation of Nigeria, states are equally represented in the\",\"option\":{\"a\":\"Senate\",\"b\":\"House of Representatives\",\"c\":\"Judiciary\",\"d\":\"National Population Commission\",\"e\":\"National Population Commission\"},\"section\":\"\",\"image\":\"\",\"answer\":\"a\",\"solution\":\"\",\"examtype\":\"wassce\",\"examyear\":\"2000\"},{\"id\":158,\"question\":\"The most important aspect of political participation in a democracy is \",\"option\":{\"a\":\"attending political rallies \",\"b\":\"voting in elections \",\"c\":\"registration with a political party \",\"d\":\"the observance of electoral processes \",\"e\":\"the observance of electoral processes \"},\"section\":\"\",\"image\":\"\",\"answer\":\"b\",\"solution\":\"\",\"examtype\":\"post-utme\",\"examyear\":\"2012\"},{\"id\":518,\"question\":\"A constitution that is difficult to amend is\",\"option\":{\"a\":\"flexible\",\"b\":\"rigid\",\"c\":\"written\",\"d\":\"unwritten.\",\"e\":\"unwritten.\"},\"section\":\"\",\"image\":\"\",\"answer\":\"c\",\"solution\":\"\",\"examtype\":\"utme\",\"examyear\":\"2013\"},{\"id\":221,\"question\":\"Which of the following factors limits the expression of public opinion?\",\"option\":{\"a\":\"The type of government in a state\",\"b\":\"The establishment of private media organizations.\",\"c\":\"The high literacy rate of the citizens\",\"d\":\"Religious belief of the citizens.\",\"e\":\"Religious belief of the citizens.\"},\"section\":\"\",\"image\":\"\",\"answer\":\"a\",\"solution\":\"\",\"examtype\":\"wassce\",\"examyear\":\"2000\"},{\"id\":482,\"question\":\"The French colonial system was underlined by the policy of\",\"option\":{\"a\":\"assimilation\",\"b\":\"paternalism\",\"c\":\"socialism\",\"d\":\"indirect rule.\",\"e\":\"indirect rule.\"},\"section\":\"\",\"image\":\"\",\"answer\":\"a\",\"solution\":\"\",\"examtype\":\"utme\",\"examyear\":\"2012\"},{\"id\":177,\"question\":\"Manipulation of electoral boundaries for electoral purposes is known as \",\"option\":{\"a\":\"delimitation \",\"b\":\"gerrymandering\",\"c\":\"devolution \",\"d\":\"deconcentration\",\"e\":\"deconcentration\"},\"section\":\"\",\"image\":\"\",\"answer\":\"b\",\"solution\":\"\",\"examtype\":\"post-utme\",\"examyear\":\"2013\"},{\"id\":268,\"question\":\"21.\\tIn a parliamentary system of government a general election is usually conducted after\",\"option\":{\"a\":\"dissolution of parliament.\",\"b\":\"plebiscite.\",\"c\":\"referendum.\",\"d\":\"resolution.\",\"e\":\"resolution.\"},\"section\":\"\",\"image\":\"\",\"answer\":\"a\",\"solution\":\"\",\"examtype\":\"neco\",\"examyear\":\"2013\"},{\"id\":100,\"question\":\"Under the 1963 Republican constitution the president exercise \",\"option\":{\"a\":\"judicial powers \",\"b\":\"executive powers \",\"c\":\"nominal powers \",\"d\":\"concurrent powers\",\"e\":\"concurrent powers\"},\"section\":\"\",\"image\":\"\",\"answer\":\"c\",\"solution\":\"\",\"examtype\":\"post-utme\",\"examyear\":\"2010\"},{\"id\":87,\"question\":\"Public opinion is important because it \",\"option\":{\"a\":\"Tells government what action it must take \",\"b\":\"Lets government know what the people want \",\"c\":\"Allows police to manage crisis \",\"d\":\"Mothers the minorities in resource learn areas \",\"e\":\"Mothers the minorities in resource learn areas \"},\"section\":\"\",\"image\":\"\",\"answer\":\"b\",\"solution\":\"\",\"examtype\":\"post-utme\",\"examyear\":\"2009\"},{\"id\":306,\"question\":\"The process of sensitizing the electorate on the need to vote on the election day and also observe the rules and regulations of election is referred to as\",\"option\":{\"a\":\"campaign\",\"b\":\"free and fair election\",\"c\":\"gerrymandering\",\"d\":\"political socialization.\",\"e\":\"political socialization.\"},\"section\":\"\",\"image\":\"\",\"answer\":\"d\",\"solution\":\"\",\"examtype\":\"neco\",\"examyear\":\"2013\"},{\"id\":73,\"question\":\"Federalism was introduced in Nigeria by the \",\"option\":{\"a\":\"Lyttleton Constitution \",\"b\":\"Clifford constitution \",\"c\":\"Macpheson constitution \",\"d\":\"1999 constitution.\",\"e\":\"1999 constitution.\"},\"section\":\"\",\"image\":\"\",\"answer\":\"a\",\"solution\":\"\",\"examtype\":\"post-utme\",\"examyear\":\"2008\"},{\"id\":454,\"question\":\"The tenure of non-permanent members of the Security Council is\",\"option\":{\"a\":\"4 years\",\"b\":\"2 years\",\"c\":\"6 years\",\"d\":\"5 years\",\"e\":\"5 years\"},\"section\":\"\",\"image\":\"\",\"answer\":\"b\",\"solution\":\"\",\"examtype\":\"utme\",\"examyear\":\"2010\"},{\"id\":166,\"question\":\"The final stage in the process of enacting legislation is \",\"option\":{\"a\":\"assent \",\"b\":\"final reading \",\"c\":\"notification \",\"d\":\"guillotine \",\"e\":\"guillotine \"},\"section\":\"\",\"image\":\"\",\"answer\":\"a\",\"solution\":\"\",\"examtype\":\"post-utme\",\"examyear\":\"2012\"},{\"id\":680,\"question\":\"The predominant influence of Northern Nigeria in the First Republic violated the federal principle of\",\"option\":{\"a\":\"effective co-operation among the constituent units\",\"b\":\"geographical contiguity\",\"c\":\"unity\",\"d\":\"absence of marked inequalities among the component units\",\"e\":\"absence of marked inequalities among the component units\"},\"section\":\"\",\"image\":\"\",\"answer\":\"d\",\"solution\":\"\",\"examtype\":\"wassce\",\"examyear\":\"1989\"},{\"id\":105,\"question\":\"In the Igbo political system, the most senior member of the council of elders is the \",\"option\":{\"a\":\"Okpara \",\"b\":\" Obi \",\"c\":\" Eze \",\"d\":\" Ofo\",\"e\":\" Ofo\"},\"section\":\"\",\"image\":\"\",\"answer\":\"a\",\"solution\":\"\",\"examtype\":\"post-utme\",\"examyear\":\"2010\"},{\"id\":550,\"question\":\"A representative of a Commonwealth country in another member state is known as\",\"option\":{\"a\":\"High Commissioner\",\"b\":\"Consul-General\",\"c\":\"Ambassador\",\"d\":\"Attaché.\",\"e\":\"Attaché.\"},\"section\":\"\",\"image\":\"\",\"answer\":\"a\",\"solution\":\"\",\"examtype\":\"utme\",\"examyear\":\"2013\"}]', 'government', 'R98RX25')
